product.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
product.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.
